title: Cant find worlds legacy orbs in shop
body: am i missing something because the worlds legacy orbs arent appearing in the accesories tab where the master pass and hextech bundles are. I thought they were going to be purchasable with rp.

replies.body: I think its after October 27 that they will be in the shop. I was confused by this too a few weeks ago.
I believe those orbs are only buyable by using the Worlds Tokens you earn from the missions. Should be able to find those in your Loot tab!
